name: VR Helmet X-ray City Joke
description:
VR Helmet X-ray City Joke - This unique application is a joke, where you can walk and explore the people!
In this game you are a superhero! Man - X-ray!
Your mission is to walk around the city and to do x-rays!
Love spy? It was always interesting to look like a man under the X-rays?
Check the people as a doctor on the X-ray!
Always curious, it looks like a skeleton.
The more you make x-rays, the more will get points.
Kopi coins and discover new X-rays!
Beat the record of his friends and loved ones!
Warning game is completely safe for your health!
With our games you will not be bored! Leave your ratings and reviews, and we will do asu game even better!
